summary: TensorFlow implementation of the XLNet model fine‑tuned for token‑level classification tasks, processing input sequences and outputting per‑token logits for tasks such as named‑entity recognition or part‑of‑speech tagging.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use XLNet‑based solution for developers needing token classification capabilities within TensorFlow pipelines, facilitating accurate sequence labeling in natural language processing applications.
